selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer as a single line output.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to return the total volume of the measuring cup as an integer in the format 'Answer: ...'.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_largest_marking
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the largest marking from the image of the measuring cup to determine its total volume.
edge_cases: Image contains multiple markings with unclear labels.
Markings are not in a standard unit for volume.
